author: felixweber
title: Bridge Builders Mentorship Program
description: There is a lack of professional, community driven initiatives to help Funded Proposers building their projects in an professional manner

author: yogo
title: Easy Engagement - New Members - AIM
description: New members/mentors wish to support catalysts but it is time-consuming and complex to learn how to best engage.

author: allisonfromm
title: Roadmap to Creating a Legal Entity
description:
Entrepreneurs need a legal structure for tax & accounting and to raise VC funds. 
Tax and accounting professionals lack crypto experience.

author: yojo
title: Distributed Autonomous Accelerator
description: The typical accelerator model is not adapted to a global distributed system and structurally underfunds underrepresented communities.

author: alexp7
title: Proposals Mentors Marketplace -Cont
description: Can the Proposal Mentor Marketplace offer skilled mentors to funded Catalyst Projects.

author: joedavidmyna
title: Professional Accounting/Tax Advice
description: There is a gap in knowledge for funded projects about the implications of tax/accounting when dealing with crypto and how to stay compliant

author: yogo
title: Strategy Framework - AIM
description: The proposal ecosystem is vast and no one strategy fits all, especially for evolving tech like Cardano

author: seedstars
title: FinancialTimes Startup Competition
description: Ideas and talent exist everywhere, not just in the Silicon Valley. Capital, business support, and access to networks, on the other hand, not

author: jcherry
title: Accelerator, Demo day, VC Capital
description: Projects need to turn ideas into businesses. This requires entrepreneurship support programs aligned with tenets of distributed governance.

author: nielskijf
title: Social Design Academy (Adagov/SDA)
description: There is a significant knowledge gap for individuals and businesses to join the web3 revolution.

author: amineoth
title: Decentralized Impact Incubation
description:
Without communities, blockchain ecosystems and decentralization could not take hold. 
We need to Build and educate a community.

author: seedstars
title: Accelerator in Emerging Markets
description: Funded projects based in emerging markets from F6 need to grow their companies besides product and blockchain development.

author: seedstars
title: Acceleration Program in Africa
description: Funded projects from F6 which are based in Africa need to grow their companies besides product and blockchain development.

author: seanstapley
title: Bermuda: ADA Innovation Sandbox
description: The blockchain industry is facing severe regulatory uncertainty across many jurisdictions, inhibiting project and startup growth.

author: dzhuliana
title: Bring more women to Cardano
description: To make the world work better for all, our community must reflect the diversity of the world. Less than 5% of the community are women.

author: bridgebuilders
title: Catalyst Leadership Academy
description: Catalyst requires world-class leadership skills to level up our impact, and growing these leaders from inside the community is critical.

author: heinz.gassner
title: Application Portfolio Assessment
description: Catalyst triggered hundreds of projects, many developing in silo-mode. This leads to substantial redundancies & lack of strategic alignment

author: wolfram.blockchain.labs
title: Wolfram Eureka Mentors for Cardano
description: Entrepreneurship is a challenging ordeal, it requires strategic support and technical advice from an experienced team.

author: erikrehbinder
title: new.tech circular accelerator
description: Sustainable consumption worldwide will only occur if we supercharge funding, collaboration and circular innovation at massive scale.

author: adamjgmiller
title: Symbiotic Catalyst Accelerator
description: Catalyst-funded projects need help finding professional business support, institutional capital, and mentoring to accelerate their impact.

author: chrisr
title: Distributed Digital ID SharkTank
description: Decentralized digital ID tech, governance & implementations require support! Cardano needs a filter/accelerator to promote projects!!

author: mayraceja
title: 6-Wk Crypto Bootcamp + VC Demo Day
description: Crypto startups need access to crypto-focused education, top crypto investors, and mentors. Most accelerators are too generic.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Cloud Credits
description: Unlike other incubators/accelerators, Catalyst does not have partnerships with cloud providers to offer credits.

author: rich
title: Let's Woo Techstars
description: Catalyst needs a world-class accelerator relationship focused on the Cardano blockchain opportunities for business development.

author: vaesgoth
title: Boost impact projects with Catalyst
description:
Environmental & social challenges are increasingly crucial.
However, impact projects lack funding and appropriate support to succeed.

author: al.kc
title: Impact innovation accelerator
description: Most accelerators do not factor purpose or impact as a driver of success, nor are they tuned to the specific needs of tech entrepreneurs.

author: erlend
title: Catalyst Community Accelerator
description: Entrepreneurs need venture building skills but often lack the necessary knowledge and access to the networks required to reach their goals.

author: hilina
title: Mereb
description: Mentors needed for the project catalyst community start ups

author: dcspark
title: Milkomeda Accelerator
description: Many Cardano fans may want to deploy on Milkomeda, but last the technical knowledge to fully bring their idea to life
